paragraph: Eu Phoria (ユーフォーリア, Yūfōria) was a Japanese all-female band, formed in 2002. They made their major debut in 2007 on Avex's label Sonic Groove. Their songs were used as the theme songs of various Japanese television dramas and variety shows such as Tokumei Kakarichō Tadano Hitoshi, Itadakimuscle, Junk Sports, and DOWN TOWN DX. The band's final performance was on October 31, 2009. Both Tomoko and Reona went on to join Gacharic Spin and Doll$Boxx.
Shoco - Real name: Shōko Suzuki (鈴木翔子) - Vocal
Tomo2 - Real name: Tomoko Midorikawa (翠川智子) - Guitar
Ayaka - Real name: Ayaka Haraguchi (原口彩香) - Bass
Reona - Real name: Reona Suzuki (鈴木玲緒奈) - Keyboard (Leader)
Sawa2 - Real name: Sawako Suzuki (鈴木佐和子) - DrumsReona and Ayaka founded the band with two other original members, who later quit. Shoco and Tomo² joined in 2005, and Sawa² joined a year later.
